scripts.dev: npm run db:migrate:local && npm run build && wrangler dev
scripts.db:migrate:local: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --local
scripts.db:migrate:remote: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --remote
scripts.db:migrations:list: npx wrangler d1 migrations list DB --remote
scripts.db:migrations:create: npx wrangler d1 migrations create DB
scripts.deploy: npm run db:migrate:remote && npm run build && wrangler deploy
